value.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moons, gaining the agility of shadows.

This increases your movement speed by 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52%, your spell speed by 12%, 16%, 20%, 22%, 25% and grant 19%, 23%, 25%, 27%, 28% evasion.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Hymn of Shadows

value.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moons, granting you stealth detection (+15, +21, +25, +28, +32 power), and invisibility detection (+15, +21, +25, +28, +32 power).

You may also attack creatures you cannot see without penalty and your critical hits do 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66% more damage.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The stealth and invisibility detection will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Hymn of Detection

value.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moons, granting you 18%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 45% stun, blindness and confusion resistance.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.
value.name: Hymn of Perseverance

value.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moons, conjuring a shroud of dancing shadows that follows you as long as this spell is active.

Each turn, a shadowy beam will hit up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 of your foes within radius 5 for 1 to 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 damage.

This powerful spell will drain 7.1, 4.8, 3.6, 2.9, 2.4 negative energy for each beam; no beam will fire if your negative energy is too low.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Hymn of Moonlight

value.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, granting you 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 Mental Save and increasing your maximum life by 11%, 14%, 18%, 20%, 23% (Currently: 108, 142, 174, 204, 231).

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Chant of Fortitude

value.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, granting you 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%, 32% physical damage resistance, 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 physical save, 15, 21, 25, 28, 32 armour and +15% armour hardiness.

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Chant of Fortress

value.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, granting you 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% fire, lightning, acid and cold damage resistance, 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 spell save and reduces the damage from enemies 3 or more spaces away by 16%, 22%, 27%, 30%, 32%.

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Chant of Resistance

value.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, empowering your light and fire elemental attacks so that they do 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66% additional damage.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of light, dealing 16, 21, 25, 29, 32 light damage to anything that hits you in melee.

Your lite radius is also increased by 2, 4, 5, 6, 6.

You may only have one Chant active at once and this Chant costs less power to sustain.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Chant of Light

value.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moons, gaining the agility of shadows.

This increases your movement speed by 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52%, your spell speed by 12%, 16%, 20%, 22%, 25% and grant 19%, 23%, 25%, 27%, 28% evasion.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Hymn of Shadows

value.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moons, granting you stealth detection (+15, +21, +25, +28, +32 power), and invisibility detection (+15, +21, +25, +28, +32 power).

You may also attack creatures you cannot see without penalty and your critical hits do 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66% more damage.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The stealth and invisibility detection will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Hymn of Detection

value.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moons, granting you 18%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 45% stun, blindness and confusion resistance.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.
value.name: Hymn of Perseverance

value.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moons, conjuring a shroud of dancing shadows that follows you as long as this spell is active.

Each turn, a shadowy beam will hit up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 of your foes within radius 5 for 1 to 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 damage.

This powerful spell will drain 7.1, 4.8, 3.6, 2.9, 2.4 negative energy for each beam; no beam will fire if your negative energy is too low.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Hymn of Moonlight

value.info_text:
You have learned to find and hit weak spots. All your strikes have a 2.8%, 4.6%, 6.2%, 7.7%, 9.1% greater chance to be critical hits, and your critical hits do 8.7%, 13%, 17%, 21%, 24% more damage.

Also, when using knives and throwing knives, you now use your Cunning instead of your Strength for bonus damage.
value.name: Lethality

value2.info_text:
You have learned to find and hit weak spots. All your strikes have a 3.1%, 5.3%, 6.6%, 7.6%, 8.4% greater chance to be critical hits, and your critical hits do 9.4%, 15%, 18%, 20%, 22% more damage.

Also, when using knives and throwing knives, you now use your Cunning instead of your Strength for bonus damage.
value2.name: Lethality

value.info_text:
You know how to make the most out of being unseen.

When striking from stealth, your attacks are automatically critical if the target does not notice you just before you land it. (Spell and mind attacks critically strike even if the target notices you.)

Your critical multiplier against targets that cannot see you is increased by up to 17%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 46%. (You must be able to see your target and the bonus is reduced from its full value at range 3 to 0 at range 10.)

Also, after exiting stealth for any reason, the critical multiplier persists for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns (with no range limitation).
value.name: Shadowstrike

value2.info_text:
You know how to make the most out of being unseen.

When striking from stealth, your attacks are automatically critical if the target does not notice you just before you land it. (Spell and mind attacks critically strike even if the target notices you.)

Your critical multiplier against targets that cannot see you is increased by up to 18%, 29%, 35%, 40%, 44%. (You must be able to see your target and the bonus is reduced from its full value at range 3 to 0 at range 10.)

Also, after exiting stealth for any reason, the critical multiplier persists for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns (with no range limitation).
value2.name: Shadowstrike

value.info_text:
All spell criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random spell talent by 1.

All mind criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random wild gift/psionic/afflicted talent by 2.

All physical criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random technique or cunning talent by 2.

This can only happen once per turn, and cannot affect the talent that triggers it.
value.name: Eye of the Tiger

value2.info_text:
All steamtech criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random steamtech talent by 1.

All spell criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random spell talent by 1.

All mind criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random wild gift/psionic/afflicted talent by 2.

All physical criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random technique or cunning talent by 2.

This can only happen once per turn, and cannot affect the talent that triggers it.
value2.name: Eye of the Tiger

value.info_text:
A small automatic detection system is always looking for incoming projectiles, when one is about to hit you it injects drugs into your system to boost your reactivity, granting you a free turn.

This effect can not happen more than once every 5 turns.
value.name: Automated Reflex System
require: Level 30, Dex 50; Have gained the Matrix Style achievement with this or any previous character for the current difficulty & permadeath settings.

value2.info_text:
A small automatic detection system is always looking for incoming projectiles, when one is about to hit you it injects drugs into your system to boost your reactivity, granting you a free turn.

This effect can not happen more than once every 5 turns.
value2.name: Automated Reflex System
require: Level 30, Dex 50; Have gained the Matrix Style achievement with this or any previous character for the current difficulty & permadeath settings.

value.info_text: When you deal a critical hit your embedded system activates, increasing all your primary stats except Strength by 50% of your Strength for 6 turn.
value.name: Pain Enhancement System
require: Level 30, Str 50; Earned the achievement 'Size Matters' on this character.

value2.info_text: When you deal a critical hit your embedded system activates, increasing all your primary stats except Strength by 50% of your Strength for 6 turn.
value2.name: Pain Enhancement System
require: Level 30, Str 50; Earned the achievement 'Size Matters' on this character.

value.info_text:
Activate a special focusing device that extends all your ranged spells and psionic powers range by 3 (only works on those with range 2 or more and up to 10 max).

The use of this device is very strenuous, increasing fatigue by 60% while active.
value.name: Range Amplification Device
require: Level 30, Wil 50; Have a light radius of 10 or more

value2.info_text:
Activate a special focusing device that extends all your ranged spells and psionic powers range by 3 (only works on those with range 2 or more and up to 10 max).

The use of this device is very strenuous, increasing fatigue by 20% while active.
value2.name: Range Amplification Device
require: Level 30, Wil 50; Have a light radius of 10 or more
